name: livepeer-open-orchestrator
description: Open infra-as-code for a globally distributed Livepeer orchestrator/transcoder, using k3s, EKS, and Helm.

scripts.create:eks:frankfurt: cross-env AWS_REGION=eu-central-1 IS_PRIMARY_CLUSTER=false IS_K3S=false dotenv yarn prepare:eks && yarn create:eks
scripts.create:eks:singapore: cross-env AWS_REGION=ap-southeast-1 IS_PRIMARY_CLUSTER=false IS_K3S=false dotenv yarn prepare:eks && yarn create:eks
scripts.create:eks:virginia: cross-env AWS_REGION=us-east-1 IS_PRIMARY_CLUSTER=true IS_K3S=false dotenv yarn prepare:eks && yarn create:eks
scripts.deploy:california: yarn creds:california && cross-env AWS_REGION=us-west-1 IS_PRIMARY_CLUSTER=false IS_K3S=true dotenv yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:frankfurt: yarn creds:frankfurt && cross-env AWS_REGION=eu-central-1 IS_PRIMARY_CLUSTER=false IS_K3S=false dotenv yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:singapore: yarn creds:singapore && cross-env AWS_REGION=ap-southeast-1 IS_PRIMARY_CLUSTER=false IS_K3S=false dotenv yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:virginia: yarn creds:virginia && cross-env AWS_REGION=us-east-1 IS_PRIMARY_CLUSTER=true IS_K3S=false dotenv yarn deploy
